feed.title: Less is better: Parallels Beta 5 Rocks
feed.subtitle: John Lam on software

entry.title: Parallels Beta 5 Rocks
entry.summary: I installed Beta 5 of Parallels last night. It now supports full screen (1440×900) on my MBP. Combining it with the Virtue desktop manager, I can now toggle between OS X and Windows XP via a really cool ‘flip’ animation and live the dual-OS lifestyle. I just pre-ordered my copy today.
entry.content: I installed Beta 5 of Parallels last night. It now supports full screen (1440×900) on my MBP. Combining it with the Virtue desktop manager, I can now toggle between OS X and Windows XP via a really cool ‘flip’ animation and live the dual-OS lifestyle. I just pre-ordered my copy today.
